thread.title: Man-Cave | There's a craft beer advent calendar, so Christmas is extra merry this year
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | There's a craft beer advent calendar, so Christmas is extra merry this year - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Man-Cave | There's a craft beer advent calendar, so Christmas is extra merry this year
text:
If you're in doubt about what to get us this Christmas, look no further.
For the low-low price of £75, you can pick up a craft beer advent calendar , and have 24 extremely merry Christmas mornings.
Forget the little chocolates, this way you can get to sample some Flying Dog’s American IPA, Raging Bitch, Anchor, and Brooklyn Brewery’s Black Chocolate Stout. Sounds a lot better than actual chocolate, amiright? AMIRIGHT?
Seriously, buy us one. Cheers.
Via Metro
